name: MazeJLM
description:
Welcome to our Maze!

In this maze you have to find the golden graffiti spray to win. Beware the traps along the way.

In your arsenal is your trusted graffiti spray to mark walls, and you can teleport randomly around the maze.

Controls:

WASD or Joystick to move.

Finger/Mouse to change screen rotation.

Finger/Mouse/SpaceBar for jumping.

Mouse/E for teleporting.

Finger/Mouse/F for spraying graffiti.

Good luck!

*Currently there is no support for Mobile on WebGL.
